document.full_text: the head of airbus parent eads is pushing for a veto right to be introduced in the defense industry to prevent hostile takeovers, a german magazine reported on sunday.
document.title: eads ceo "seeks veto right" against hostile takeovers
lines_and_colors: the head of airbus parent eads is pushing for a veto right to be introduced in the defense industry to prevent hostile takeovers, a german magazine reported on sunday.
